translations: adj.使痛苦的；悲伤的；使烦恼的
v.使痛苦；迫使（distress 的 ing 形式）；使困苦

phrs.translation: 财务困境，财务危机；金融困顿
胎儿宫内窒息，胎儿窘迫
精神苦闷，精神上的痛苦

sentences.sentence: She witnessed some very distressing scenes.
sentences.translation: 她目睹过一些令人非常痛苦的场面。

sentences.sentence: It is very distressing to see your baby attached to tubes and monitors.
sentences.translation: 看到你的孩子插着管子，连着监控器，真是令人担忧。

sentences.sentence: This is particularly distressing because time seems to be a vital factor in the appreciation of all art forms.
sentences.translation: 这是特别令人苦恼的，因为在所有艺术形式的鉴赏过程中，时间是一个至关重要的因素。
